arts.ttl: PSG’s Lucas Hernandez Drops ‘Very Confident’ Take for Return Leg Against Liverpool
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain heads to Anfield with plenty of momentum following a 4-1 victory over Stade Rennais on Saturday at Roazhon Park. The match was goalless for the first 25 minutes, but in the 27th, Bradley Barcola put PSG ahead 1-0. The second half saw both teams exchange goals early. arts.ttl: 'We were far superior' - Enrique insists PSG 'deserved more'
arts.sum: Paris St-Germain boss Luis Enrique ends his post-match interview after their remarkable defeat by Liverpool with a bit of positivity.

arts.ttl: Dembélé reaches 20 league goals for PSG as unbeaten French leader wins 4-1 at Rennes
arts.sum: Barcola put PSG ahead in the 28th minute when he placed the ball through goalkeeper Brice Samba’s legs. Bradley Barcola got one goal and set up another as PSG moved 16 points ahead of second-placed Marseille, which hosted Lens later Saturday.
